title: banning brought accounts
body: Is there anyway to report bought accounts because they are everywhere, I'm not highly ranked but on multiple occasions it has stopped my friends and I being able to climb, due to bad players buying level 30 accounts and playing ranked queues, just please, anyone?

replies.body: You can send the names and any evidence you have (like screenshots etc) in [a ticket to player support.](http://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They won't be able to tell you any outcomes for privacy reasons, but you can rest easy knowing they are under manual review :)

It sucks balls, but all you can really do is send a support ticket to Rito.

And players think it is our fault for playing bad, never the players we get stuck with.

Sometimes it isnt brought account but players going into prem8 and get carried to the elo that their in....

#dynamic queue so fun

here is my tips for you fellow ranked players
during champion select, DO CHECK your own teammates in lolking or op.gg
If there is anyone with red match history with big negative kda or cs, dodge asap.. or troll.. up to you
